legacy.full_text: #Shanghai Vice Mayor Hua Yuan met with diplomatic envoys who are in the city for the #LantingForum. Impressed by Shanghai’s rapid development, diplomatic envoys gave thumbs-up in a group photo. “Every time we visit Shanghai, there’s never enough time.” https://t.co/mVyrGt5k12

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: Ésta es Shanghai, cuna del PCCh y pionera de reforma y apertura de China. Como su primera cita fuera de Beijing, y de…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: Ésta es Shanghai, cuna del PCCh y pionera de reforma y apertura de China. Como su primera cita fuera de Beijing, y de estilo internacional, el Foro Lanting celebrará en esta metrópoli socialista moderna debates entre invitados de lujo sobre “La Modernización China y el Mundo”.

legacy.description: The official account of the Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Vancouver
legacy.name: Chinese Consulate General in Vancouver

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: Shanghai, berceau du PCC, pionnier de la réforme et de l’ouverture et métropole socialiste moderne, accueille le Forum…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: Shanghai, berceau du PCC, pionnier de la réforme et de l’ouverture et métropole socialiste moderne, accueille le Forum Lanting tenu pour la 1re fois hors de Beijing. Discussions à venir avec des invités internationaux de poids sur « la modernisation à la chinoise et le monde ».

legacy.full_text: RT @SpokespersonCHN: This is #Shanghai, the birthplace of the CPC, the pioneer of China’s reform & opening up & a modern socialist metropol…

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: This is #Shanghai, the birthplace of the CPC, the pioneer of China’s reform & opening up & a modern socialist metropolis, which is hosting the #LantingForum outside of Beijing for the 1st time. Prominent guests are here to discuss “Chinese Modernization and the World”. https://t.co/zzmKE7kscP

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: Meet-the-World Lounge in #Shanghai is chosen as the venue for #LantingForum not only for its prime location, but also for Shanghai’s stunning change it symbolizes. Once warehouses on a wharf, the site was transformed into modern architecture within years. https://t.co/1anNutt5Ev

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The event has drawn hundreds of renowned and influential leaders of governments, businesses, academia and international organizations from around the world, who will share their insights on Chinese modernization and what it means for the world.
